name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Salesforce Developer
professional_summary: Utilized Salesforce LWC and Apex to build a custom insurance claims portal, streamlining policy management and reducing manual errors in claim processing.
Developed VisualForce pages for a healthcare client, integrating with external APIs to fetch patient data securely, ensuring HIPAA compliance throughout the process.
Implemented Salesforce Flow and Process Builder to automate lead assignment and notification workflows, improving lead response times for a banking client.
Configured CPQ in Salesforce to handle complex pricing rules for an insurance client, ensuring accurate quotes and reducing errors in policy generation.
Integrated Salesforce with external systems using REST APIs, enabling seamless data exchange between Salesforce and banking core systems.
Built custom Lightning Web Components (LWC) to enhance user experience in a healthcare portal, improving data entry efficiency for medical staff.
Used Apex triggers and batch processing to optimize data migration from legacy systems to Salesforce, ensuring data integrity during the transition.
Designed and deployed Salesforce communities for customer self-service, reducing support ticket volume for an insurance provider.
Implemented Salesforce Shield for a healthcare client to meet compliance requirements, ensuring data encryption and audit trail capabilities.
Developed custom Apex controllers and VisualForce pages to support complex business logic in a banking application, improving transaction processing efficiency.
Configured Salesforce Sales Cloud for a consulting client, setting up lead management and opportunity tracking to streamline sales processes.
Built custom reports and dashboards in Salesforce for a healthcare client, providing real-time insights into patient engagement and treatment outcomes.
Utilized Salesforce Einstein Analytics to deliver predictive insights for an insurance client, helping identify high-risk policies and improve underwriting decisions.
Implemented Salesforce Marketing Cloud for a banking client, enabling targeted email campaigns and improving customer engagement metrics.
Developed custom Apex classes to handle bulk data processing, improving performance for large-scale data operations in Salesforce.
Configured Salesforce Service Cloud for a healthcare client, setting up case management and knowledge base to enhance customer support efficiency.
Integrated Salesforce with ERP systems using middleware, ensuring seamless data flow between Salesforce and backend systems for a consulting client.
Trained end-users on Salesforce functionalities, ensuring smooth adoption and reducing support requests across multiple client projects.

CRM Platforms: Salesforce (LWC, VisualForce, Apex, Flow, Process Builder, CPQ, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Einstein Analytics, Salesforce Shield)
Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
